Job Title: Interior Designer – Multifamily Studio

Job Description

Join our Architecture division and leverage your skills in a dynamic environment that covers projects from initial feasibility studies to construction administration and start-up. We are seeking an Interior Designer for our multifamily studio, based in Charlotte, NC. The successful candidate will be instrumental in maintaining client confidence and satisfaction for repeat business, working autonomously to deliver exceptional results.

Hard Skills

  • Minimum 3 years of architectural experience in a production environment
  • Bachelor’s degree in Architecture from an accredited school
  • Revit proficiency (minimum 3 years)
  • Knowledge of drawing production for presentation, zoning, and contract documents
  • Rendering ability from Revit
  • Understanding of building systems, costs, and accessibility codes

Soft Skills

  • Strong communication skills (verbal and written)
  • Good interpersonal skills and diplomacy
  • Ability to solve technical issues
  • Passion for building design

Work Site

This is an on site position.

About Actalent

Actalent is a global leader in engineering and sciences services and talent solutions. We help visionary companies advance their engineering and science initiatives through access to specialized experts who drive scale, innovation and speed to market. With a network of almost 30,000 consultants and more than 4,500 clients across the U.S., Canada, Asia and Europe, Actalent serves many of the Fortune 500.
